title: gifting
body: when will the gifting option be available again ?

replies.body:
I was unable to locate any issues with gifting.  Are you using the updated client?  Try gifting in the legacy client to see if that works:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if you still have any issues with this.
He might be asking about mystery gifting.

There shouldn't be any issue with gifting either way through the legacy client.  If you still have an issue, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Billing team will take  a look at your specific issue!
I dont have the beta client and mine and my husbands gifting as been down for over a week now as well.
